rule Bypass_Sample
{
    meta:
        description = "Evasion bypass rule targeting stack operations and calls"
        cape_options = "bp0=$pattern0+0,action0=skip,bp1=$pattern1+0,action1=skip,bp2=$pattern2+0,action2=skip,count=0"

    strings:
        $pattern0 = { E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 85 C0 } // Call with wildcarded offset
        $pattern1 = { 74 ?? } // Conditional jump near with displacement
        $pattern2 = { 6A ?? 5A 8B CE E8 ???? } // Stack manipulation and call

    condition:
        any of them
}
